https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uNCZh6YGg6r0GMyrctI14R0lHGL.jpg After six lifelong friends have a five-year falling out, “The Bobfather”, reunites his pals for the Buddy Games, an insane competition of absurd physical and mental challenges with the chance to win a $150,000 pot. Now all bets are off, as the determined dudes' fight, claw, and party for the big bucks. Buddy Games
